directions: Place the canola oil in a skillet and heat over medium heat. Stir in the garlic, and cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add the butter, anchovies, and sardines. Cook and stir until well blended, 10 to 15 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: 4 (2 ounce) cans anchovy fillets packed in olive oil, drained
3 (4 ounce) cans sardines packed in olive oil, drained
title: Bagna Calda (Italian Garlic-Anchovy-Sardine Appetizer)
